        <div class="sm-12 lg-8">
            <div class="message-text A-TYP16R-RW-ALL"><p>HSBC will never ask customers to contact third-party insurance companies via SMS links or phone numbers.     <div class="A-EXPCNT-RW-RBWM expander">
        <div class="dropdown" aria-controls="842150419__panel0" role="button" tabindex="0" aria-expanded="false">
            <h3 id="842150419__tab0" class="dropdown-text">HSBC MPF Flexi-contributions </h3>
            <span class="chevron"></span>
        </div>
        <section id="842150419__panel0" class="exp-content" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1">
            <div class="exp-panel">




    
        
        
            
            
            
            
            <div class="cc-wrapper O-COLCTRL-RW-DEV" role="region">
    

<div id="content_main_columnControl_19">
    
    <div class="cc cc-columns-100  ">
        
        <div id="content_main_columnControlColumn_33" class="cc-column">
            




    
        
        
            
            
            
            
            <div class="M-CONTMAST-RW-RBWM O-SMARTSPCGEN-DEV rich-text" role="region"><div id="content_main_richtext_26" class=" A-PAR16R-RW-ALL-WRAPPER" data-date-format="D/M/YYYY" data-time-format="HH:MM:SS A" data-zone="Hongkong">
    <p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">HSBC MPF Flexi-contributions are a straightforward, totally private way for employees to make additional contributions to build up their MPF funds. We offer total control and flexibility to make additional contributions. Benefits include:</p> 
<ul class="A-LSTU-RW-ALL"> 
 <li>Total control: You can make contributions at your own pace. The service is totally private and independent of your employer</li> 
 <li>Flexible and convenient payments: You can make monthly regular contributions from as little as HKD300 by direct debit, or simply pay HKD1,000 or more at the time of your choice</li> 
 <li>Simple and easy application: All contributions under your MPF account will be invested in the same choice of funds for hassle-free investing</li> 
 <li>Flexible management: You can change your Flexi-contributions anytime or even withdraw your accumulated amount free of charge. This is subject to a minimum of HKD5,000 per withdrawal up to 12 times in a scheme financial period (from 1 July to 30 June each year).</li> 
</ul> 
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">To make regular Flexi-contributions, download and complete the Flexi-contributions Application Form (<a href="/content/dam/hsbc/hk/docs/mpf/inpc.pdf" target="_blank" rel="noopener"><span aria-hidden="true">INPC</span><span class="visuallyhidden">INPC  This link will open in a new window</span></a>). To amend your instructions, complete the Change of Regular Flexi-contributions Instruction Form (<a href="/content/dam/hsbc/hk/docs/mpf/inpa.pdf" target="_blank" rel="noopener"><span aria-hidden="true">INPA</span><span class="visuallyhidden">INPA  This link will open in a new window</span></a>). If you have any questions, call our service hotline <a href="tel:85231280128" class="no-link" role="presentation">+852 3128 0128</a>.</p> 
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL"><strong>Remarks</strong><br> </p> 
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">Flexi-contributions are accepted at the discretion of the Trustee. The Trustee reserves the right not to accept any Flexi-contributions.</p>
</div></div>

        
    
        
        
            
            
            
            
            <div class="M-CONTMAST-RW-RBWM O-SMARTSPCGEN-DEV rich-text" role="region"><div id="content_main_richtext_27" class=" A-PAR16R-RW-ALL-WRAPPER" data-date-format="D/M/YYYY" data-time-format="HH:MM:SS A" data-zone="Hongkong">
    <p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">     </p>

</div></div>

        
    


        </div>
    </div>

            <div class="M-CONTMAST-RW-RBWM O-SMARTSPCGEN-DEV rich-text" role="region"><div id="content_main_richtext_28" class=" A-PAR16R-RW-ALL-WRAPPER" data-date-format="D/M/YYYY" data-time-format="HH:MM:SS A" data-zone="Hongkong">
    <p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">Tax deductible voluntary contributions can help you to meet the long-term saving objective for retirement protection and enjoy tax concession in accordance with the Inland Revenue Ordinance. Click <a href="/mpf/products/tvc-accounts/" target="_blank" rel="noopener"><span aria-hidden="true">here</span><span class="visuallyhidden">here  This link will open in a new window</span></a> to learn more about Tax Deductible Voluntary Contributions.</p> 
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">Remarks:<br> </p> 
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">Tax deductible voluntary contributions is accepted at the discretion of the Trustee. The Trustee reserves the right not to accept additional voluntary contributions.</p>
</div></div>

            <div class="M-CONTMAST-RW-RBWM O-SMARTSPCGEN-DEV rich-text" role="region"><div id="content_main_richtext_29" class=" A-PAR16R-RW-ALL-WRAPPER" data-date-format="D/M/YYYY" data-time-format="HH:MM:SS A" data-zone="Hongkong">
    <p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">As your circumstances change over time, you may decide to change the way your investments are allocated in your MPF account. There are 4 ways to do this: portfolio rebalance**, asset switch, contribution redirection and exiting the Default Investment Strategy (DIS).</p> 
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">Your investment allocation will apply to all types of contributions, including mandatory, voluntary, and Flexi-contributions together with amounts transferred from another scheme. Change of investment allocation is applied at account level. For example, if you hold 2 accounts with HSBC MPF and would like to rebalance your portfolio for both accounts, you'll need to give instructions for the 2 accounts separately.</p>
</div></div>

            <div class="M-CONTMAST-RW-RBWM O-SMARTSPCGEN-DEV rich-text" role="region"><div id="content_main_richtext_30" class=" A-PAR16R-RW-ALL-WRAPPER" data-date-format="D/M/YYYY" data-time-format="HH:MM:SS A" data-zone="Hongkong">
    <p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">If such changes apply to members' existing investments, different dealing cut-off times may apply to valid instructions received through different service channels: (1) investment option form - within 5 business days after the date of receipt of the valid instruction will be used as the date of fund price for fund dealing if such valid instruction is received on a business day; (2) designated service channels, eg HSBC MPF website or Interactive Voice Response System (IVRS) - date of receipt of the valid instruction will be used as the date of fund price for fund dealing if such valid instruction is received by 4pm on a business day. Members should check the disclosures on different service channels before giving instructions.</p> 
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">Fees and charges of an MPF Conservative Fund can be deducted from either (i) the assets of the fund or (ii) members' account by way of unit deduction. The MPF Conservative Fund of HSBC MPF scheme uses method (i) and, therefore, its unit prices, net asset value (NAV) and fund performance quoted has reflected the impact of fees and charges.</p> 
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL"><a id="footnote"></a>** Change the investment allocation of your existing investments, future contributions and accrued benefits transferred from another registered scheme</p>
</div></div>

    <h3 aria-label="Important notes" class="A-TYP28L-RW-ALL">Important notes</h3>
    <div class="genericModalBody parsys">




    
        
        
            
            
            
            
            <div class="M-CONTMAST-RW-RBWM O-SMARTSPCGEN-DEV rich-text"><div data-zone="Hongkong" data-time-format="HH:MM:SS A" data-date-format="D/M/YYYY" class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL-WRAPPER" id="genericModalBody_richtext_1">
    <ul class="A-LSTU-RW-ALL"> 
 <li>The HSBC Mandatory Provident Fund - SuperTrust Plus is a mandatory provident fund scheme.<br> </li> 
 <li>You should consider your own risk tolerance level and financial circumstances before making any investment choices or investing in the MPF Default Investment Strategy (the ‘DIS’). You should note that the DIS Constituent Funds, namely, the Core Accumulation Fund and the Age 65 Plus Fund, the DIS or a certain Constituent Fund may not be suitable for you. There may be a risk mismatch between the DIS Constituent Funds or a certain Constituent Fund and your risk profile (the resulting portfolio risk may be greater than your risk preference). When you are in doubt as to whether the DIS or a certain Constituent Fund is suitable for you (including whether it is consistent with your investment objectives), you should seek financial and/or professional advice. You should make the investment decision most suitable for you taking into account your circumstances.</li> 
 <li>You should note that the implementation of the DIS may have an impact on your MPF investments and accrued benefits. We recommend that you consult with the Trustee if you have doubts on how you are being affected.</li> 
 <li>The Guaranteed Fund invests solely in an approved pooled investment fund (‘APIF’) in the form of an insurance policy provided by HSBC Life (International) Limited. The guarantee is also given by HSBC Life (International) Limited. Your investments in the Guaranteed Fund, if any, are therefore subject to the credit risks of HSBC Life (International) Limited. Please refer to section 4 ‘Risks’ of the <a rel="noopener" target="_blank" href="/content/dam/hsbc/hk/docs/mpf/mpf_scheme_brochure.pdf"><span aria-hidden="true">MPF Scheme Brochure</span><span class="visuallyhidden">MPF Scheme Brochure This link will open in a new window This link will open in a new window</span></a> for details of the credit risk.</li> 
 <li>The guarantee in the Guaranteed Fund only applies under certain conditions. Please refer to subsection 3.4.3(f) ‘Guarantee features’ of the <a rel="noopener" target="_blank" href="/content/dam/hsbc/hk/docs/mpf/mpf_scheme_brochure.pdf"><span aria-hidden="true">MPF Scheme Brochure</span><span class="visuallyhidden">MPF Scheme Brochure This link will open in a new window This link will open in a new window</span></a> for details of the guarantee features (including in the context of payment of accrued benefits in instalments) and the ‘Guarantee Conditions’.<br> </li> 
 <li>MPF Benefits, AVC Benefits and TVC Benefits are payable on a Member’s 65th birthday or on early retirement on or after reaching age 60. The accrued benefits can be paid in one lump sum or in instalments, at the Member’s election.  The accrued benefits can be paid in such form and on such terms and conditions as the Trustee may, to the extent not prohibited by the MPF Ordinance or General Regulation, prescribe. Please refer to subsection 6.7(c) ‘Payment of MPF Benefits, AVC Benefits and TVC Benefits’ of the <a rel="noopener" target="_blank" href="/content/dam/hsbc/hk/docs/mpf/mpf_scheme_brochure.pdf"><span aria-hidden="true">MPF Scheme Brochure</span><span class="visuallyhidden">MPF Scheme Brochure This link will open in a new window This link will open in a new window</span></a> for details.</li> 
 <li>You should not invest based on the information shown on this website alone and should read the <a rel="noopener" target="_blank" href="/content/dam/hsbc/hk/docs/mpf/mpf_scheme_brochure.pdf"><span aria-hidden="true">MPF Scheme Brochure</span><span class="visuallyhidden">MPF Scheme Brochure This link will open in a new window This link will open in a new window</span></a>. <br> </li> 
 <li>Investment involves risks. Past performance is not indicative of future performance. The value of financial instruments, in particular stocks and shares, and any income from such financial instruments, may go down as well as up. For further details including the product features and risks involved, please refer to the <a rel="noopener" target="_blank" href="/content/dam/hsbc/hk/docs/mpf/mpf_scheme_brochure.pdf"><span aria-hidden="true">MPF Scheme Brochure</span><span class="visuallyhidden">MPF Scheme Brochure This link will open in a new window This link will open in a new window</span></a>. <br> </li> 
 <li>Important – if you are in doubt about the meaning or effect of the contents of the <a rel="noopener" target="_blank" href="/content/dam/hsbc/hk/docs/mpf/mpf_scheme_brochure.pdf"><span aria-hidden="true">MPF Scheme Brochure</span><span class="visuallyhidden">MPF Scheme Brochure This link will open in a new window This link will open in a new window</span></a>, you should seek independent professional advice.</li> 
</ul>
</div></div>
